posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following Willetts cards. Looking for raw or graded. Please let me know if you have any as I'm working on a low to mid-grade back run. 

Cycle
El Principe de Gales (EPDG)
Sovereign
Tolstoi


Please send price info and scans PM or e-mail: [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

Hi Ralph,
Have two duplicates, one matching your want list with a Sovereign 350 back (looks to me like the apple-green variety), which I can part with for $80. Sharp corners, good picture and registration, a little miscentered to the bottom.  The other's a Sweet Cap 350 back (SGC 50, can provide scans and price if you're interested).  Price includes delivery and paypal fees.  Scans below, and e-mail sent as well.
Best of luck on your back run,
--S
